Ingredients.4: 1 (8 ounce) package fat-free cream cheese, softened

Ingredients.6: 0.5 cup fat-free blue cheese salad dressing

Ingredients.7: 0.5 cup Buffalo wing sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)

Ingredients.8: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded smoked Cheddar cheese

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Saute chicken in the hot oil with garlic powder until no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, 5 to 8 minutes.

Directions.3: Spread cream cheese onto the bottom of an oven-proof round pie dish. Add cooked chicken and blue cheese crumbles.

Directions.4: Mix blue cheese salad dressing and Buffalo sauce together in a bowl; pour evenly over cream cheese and chicken. Top with smoked Cheddar cheese.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until heated through and cheese is melted, about 25 minutes. Remove from the oven and let rest for 2 to 3 minutes; stir to mix ingredients.
